page.title: 17Social Life-Aust, Littleton
page.content: Social life in the two villages is limited. Activities tend to centre on the two public houses:the Boar's Head at Aust and the White Hart at Littleton. The White Hart has a skittle alley and some of the villagers belong to the skittle club. One farmer we spoke to in Aust said he had a boy aged nineteen and a girl aged seventeen who had often found it boring living so far away from entertainment. However now his son was older he was able to go to Bristol on his own and had joined the Young Farmer's Club which met at Elberton, about a mile away. On the day we visited Aust, Trotting Races were being advertised at Cote Farm.
